HomeWiki:
Project Description
Ever wondered what those CorrelationIDs in SharePoint error messages are all about?

SPFLogger demystifies the SharePoint logging database and unearths the treasure of information captured therein. It will show you the true power of SharePoint 2010's new logging capability.

A brief overview

With 3 areas of focus (NT Event Log, ULS Trace Logs, and Timer Job Logs) SPFLogger helps you to identify:
  • what errors are occurring in your environment
  • a frequency of occurrence of errors
  • drill into specific Correlation IDs
  • review Timer Job logs and their frequency

This Silverlight RIA Services application can be in an IIS Web Site directly on your SharePoint Server and with minimal configuration be providing you with invaluable data about your SharePoint 2010 farm in a matter of minutes. For a walkthrough of available screens in the current tool, please visit the links below. For instructions on implementation, visit the Documentation section.
*NT Event Log*


*ULS Trace Log*


*Timer Job Log*
